metadata.title: CVE-2017-0807 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - untriaged
metadata.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Android framework (uiframework). Product: Android. Versions: 4.4.4, 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1,7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-35056974.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
